name: Cassandra
text: I ordered the large 3 toppings for $10. Pizza was ready when I arrived at the pick up time. I live about 3 minutes away and the pizza was barely warm when I got home. The pizza tasted ok for the price.

name: Nancy Lee Dennis
text: We ordered carry out, and were told to park in carry out designated area. There were no signs to indicate where that area was, and we sat for 10 minutes before giving up and going inside to pick out our food. Someone inside looked outside …More

text: It’s actually a shame teens are smoking on the job... Pizza Hut is a great place to order food from but the teenagers in the back are making it non trustworthy.... I would definitely contact Malik hatchett about this, if you need further …More

text: My experience was horrible. I ordered the pizza online at 7 pm and off set the pick up time for 7:45. When I arrived at 7:50, payed for my pizza, pizza is lost. How you lose a large 2 topping pizza is beyond me. I had to another 10 minutes …More

text: Awesome place with great customer service. Even if you do have to wait on the order the people working there will let you know how soon your order will be ready. All around a great place to visit.

text: It took over an hour and a half to get two pizzas. The cost was $40. I found both service and cost to be unacceptable. If your product is going to cost this much then it had better be perfect. The pizza was not only not worth the money, but …More

text: I've been a faithful customer to pizza hut for years bit these last couple of times at this particular location their customer service is horrible and the quality of the food is poor. If you want good customer service and good food go to the pizza hut in Graham they're 100 times better.

text: food was doughy in the center like it was uncooked when i called to ask for replacement, I was told that is weird it looked fine when it was going out, and then i asked about the cheese on top of the pizza having large blotches where there …More

text: Placed online order at 630 and was provided with pickup time of 730. After driving to the store, pizza was not ready until 8:20. Clerk made the comment that tonight had been worse than the Super Bowl. Pizza was not bad but the breadsticks …More

text:
AMBER WAS GREAT ON MY PHONE ORDER. SHE WAS PATIENT IN DESCRIBING FEATURED ITEMS AND SHE HAD A GREAT SMILE IN HER VOICE!
IT WAS A JOY TO WORK WITH HER TO PLACE MY ORDER!!!  THANKS AMBER! YOU ARE AN ASSET TO THE PIZZA HUT TEAM!

text: This place always disappoints, but worse than that, I usually end any transaction with these people not only let down but angry. The staff is apathetic, lazy and rude. They seem to be more interested in their cell phones than their …More

text: Very disappointed. I always used to prefer Pizza Hut over any other pizza place. However now, I choose Dominios. The last visit, my pizza was super dry and jave hardly no flavor which is a complete disappointment.
